PhD Openings

I have multiple PhD student openings in Information Sciences and Computer Science in the following research areas:

  • Continual learning and few-shot learning: learning deep neural networks efficiently on limited labeled data and continual data streams. Related papers: [Sun et al., 2019], [Liu et al., 2020], [Liu et al., 2021], [Liu et al., 2023], [Fischer et al., 2024], etc.
  • 3D generative models: developing 3D-aware generative models to better understand the underlying 3D structures in 2D images. Related papers: [Ma et al., 2023], [Fischer et al., 2024], [Ma et al., 2024], etc.

If you are interested, please send an email to lyy+apply@g.illinois.edu with your CV and transcripts. Please remember to submit your formal application through the official system as well.

Contact information

Email: lyy+apply@g.illinois.edu
Office: Room 5125, 614 E. Daniel St., Champaign, IL 61820
